section_title: INTERNAL REVIEW OF THE SECRETARIATS ACTIVITIES
sentences: Chair Dovland convened this contact group on the internal review of the activities of the Secretariat (FCCC/2005/6) to review his revised draft.
On the draft recommendations of the SBI to COP 11, a paragraph proposed earlier by the EU on cooperation and communication with other relevant international organizations, was opposed by the US.
India, for the G-77/CHINA, introduced a reference to the biennium budget document (FCCC/SBI/2005/8).
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
